text:
Hello,
We used for some time the new Syntax Highlighter based on rsyntaxtextarea.
It suffers from a bug which leads to an OutOfMemoryError.

Analyzing heap dump, it comes from RUndoManager components which holds all memory and does not free it.

It affects nightly build as of 24 september 2013
Regards
Ubik Load Pack Team

http://www.ubikloadpack.com
